updates.title: Version 2.1.0 Released
updates.content: Major update featuring improved graphics, new sound effects, and enhanced tank physics. Also includes various bug fixes and performance improvements.

updates.title: Matchmaking Improvements
updates.content: Updated matchmaking system for better team balance and reduced waiting times. New skill-based ranking system implemented.

updates.title: UI Overhaul
updates.content: Complete redesign of the user interface for better usability and modern look. New customization options for HUD elements.

updates.title: Server Maintenance
updates.content: Scheduled maintenance completed. Server infrastructure upgraded for better performance and stability.
